column1: Has a safe, proven treatment or vaccine for Covid-19 been developed and I missed the breaking news? Everyone is just done with staying home, so coronavirus has magically disappeared? W.T.A.F.

#coronavirus now close to us. 115 km on heavily traveled route. https://cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/canada-1st-case-coronavirus-toronto-1.5440760 … Think it's origin was military, either #US #China #Russia #Israel etc as originator or as defense experiment. This nonsense MUST stop before we exterminate ourselves and only roaches are left.
